pr_title: "scopeFilter" return wrong data in getPattern APIs #545

timeline.message: Add a new query parameter scopeFilter to the pattern API
"scopeFilter" return wrong data in getPattern APIs(#545)
Confuse description for scopeFilter in getPattern APIs(#546)

timeline.bodyText: Is it more convenient to filter data when get categorie‘s data?
timeline.author: huihuiw01

replies.bodyText: In the buildPatternMap method, after obtaining the data of categories, there are other processing logics in the follow-up, so it is not recommended to put in the getCategories method.
replies.author: chaoq0318

timeline.bodyText:
What's the usage of 'scopeFilter'?
Is it possible to have such value: currency_CNY, measurements_volume-liter, ^(dates_dateTimeFormats_intervalFormats )?
If yes, looks like the logic doesn't handle this.
timeline.author: huihuiw01

replies.bodyText: Currently only supports forward or reverse, this format is temporarily not supported.
replies.author: chaoq0318

timeline.author: huihuiw01
